description: Defines data models and mock data generation for movies and movie rows in a TV home screen frontend.

classes.name: MovieItem
classes.description: Data class representing a movie with properties like id, title, year, rating, duration, genres, synopsis, and a color placeholder.

classes.name: MovieRow
classes.description: Data class representing a horizontal row of movies with an id, title, and list of MovieItem objects.

methods.name: buildMockRows
methods.description: Function that generates a list of MovieRow objects with mock data for use in the home screen.
